announcements.title: Reminder: Capstone Class & Agentic AI Workshop
announcements.content:
Dear all,
Please note that we will be meeting in the Canada Life Village Square, F Building, for our regular capstone project class from 1–2 PM, followed by the Agentic AI workshop from 2-4 PM.
I appreciate full attendance (I will be taking attendance before 2 pm) for this session, as it is organized exclusively for AIM students.
Thank you,Magdalene

announcements.title: Building Agentic AI using IBM Tools - 18th Nov, Tuesday, 2-4 PM
announcements.content:
Hello everyone,
Here is another exciting opportunity to learn Agentic AI building using IBM tools.
Register Now!
Nov 18th, 2-4 PM at Canada Life Village Square (F1027/F1029), Innovation Village
Hands-on Workshop: Building Agents with watsonx Orchestrate
Learning Objectives
By the end of this session, you’ll be able to:
Understand what watsonx Orchestrate is and how it works
Build agents without writing any code
Integrate tools and knowledge bases into your agents
Create agentic RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) solutions
Use external tools like Firecrawl for web scraping
Govern Agents
This is a hands-on session, so don’t forget to bring your laptop!
It’s also a fantastic chance to meet industry experts from IBM and gain insights into their expectations.

announcements.title: Gentle Reminder - Sprint 2
announcements.content:
Dear all,
Please note that your Sprint 2 presentation will take place today, November 4th from 1:00 to 4:00 p.m.
The presentation is GRADED!
Thank you,
Magdalene

announcements.title: Gentle Reminder - Building with Agentic AI: A Hands-on Workshop
announcements.content:
Dear all,
You should have received the meeting invitation along with your registration confirmation. However, I’m sharing it here again in case you’re unable to locate it.

announcements.title: Sprint 2 Submission - reg
announcements.content:
Dear all,
Please submit your Sprint 2 work by October 28th, as you will need to begin working on Sprint 3 right after.
Since we couldn’t have our Sprint presentation due to the workshop, it has been rescheduled to November 4th but there is no change to the submission date.
Thank you,
Magdalene
